#summary Installation of XMPPHP-SMS
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

This page explains how to install XMPPHP-SMS plugin for [http://code.google.com/p/xmpphp/ XMPPHP] class.

= System requirements =

The system requirements of this plugin is the same as for [http://code.google.com/p/xmpphp/ XMPPHP library].

= Installation procedure =

  # Download and install the latest version of XMPPHP library: http://code.google.com/p/xmpphp/
  # Download the latest version of plugin: (link to release)
  # Copy XMPP_SMS.php file to the same directory where XMPP.php file from XMPPHP library resides
  # Installation complete
